description:
Whether you’re getting water from a stream on a hike, or being careful with tap water on vacation, this little inline filter will help keep you safe. Using hollow fibre filtration, this filter has a fast flow rate and is super easy to clean. Compatible with HydraPak bottles and reservoirs, you can use this filter with your hydration bladder for clean water as you sip, attach it to a Stow bottle to squeeze out clean water, or set up a gravity filtration system with Seeker or Pioneer water storage bags. The integrated 28mm threads even let you attach this filter to standard single use plastic bottles.

  • Removes 99.99% of E coli & parasitic cysts
  • Plug-n-play compatibility easily attaches to many HydraPak bottles and reservoirs
  • 28mm threading attaches to many single use plastic bottles
  • Cleaning is easy with the included backflush adapter
  • Filters about 1500L of water, varies depending on water quality
  • Do not allow the cartridge to freeze after initial use
  • Includes: filter, cap adapter, backflush adapter
name: Hydrapak 28 mm Inline Filter
